content:
The KKE (M-L) invites you to the discussion it organizes in the book "Outside the Walls" on the occasion of this year's March 8th anniversary.

We discuss:

  • For double oppression of woman in capitalism today
  • For bourgeois feminism and disorienting ideologies

We highlight the class character of the female issue and its connection to the struggle to overthrow the system that generates it
title: 8 March 2024: We are discussing the female issue in "Outside the Walls" - KKE (M -L)
description: The KKE (M-L) invites you to the discussion it organizes in the book "Outside the Walls" on the occasion of this year's March 8th anniversary.
author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
